/*Purpose: dispatches to the correct schedule updating algorithm.*/
CREATE PROCEDURE [update_schedule]( @PROJECT_ID CHAR(32), @TZ_NAME NVARCHAR(50) = NULL, @isForDebugFlagS char(1) = '0' ) AS BEGIN DECLARE @wbs_id VARCHAR(32) DECLARE @SCHEDULING_TYPE CHAR(64) DECLARE @tmpErr INT
declare @isForDebugFlag bit set @isForDebugFlag = convert(bit, @isForDebugFlagS)
SELECT @wbs_id = wbs_id, @SCHEDULING_TYPE = scheduling_type FROM [PROJECT] WHERE id = @PROJECT_ID IF @wbs_id IS NULL BEGIN SELECT 'FAILURE: WBS_ID is null' as result_text RETURN END
EXEC [innovator].[business_calendar_compile_check] @TZ_NAME SET @tmpErr = @@ERROR IF @tmpErr <> 0 RETURN @tmpErr
IF @SCHEDULING_TYPE = 'Forward' or @SCHEDULING_TYPE = 'Backward' BEGIN EXEC [innovator].[update_critical_path_schedule] @PROJECT_ID, @TZ_NAME, @isForDebugFlag
SET @tmpErr = @@ERROR; IF @tmpErr <> 0 RETURN @tmpErr
EXEC [innovator].[compute_wbs_start_finish] @wbs_id SET @tmpErr = @@ERROR; IF @tmpErr <> 0 RETURN @tmpErr END ELSE BEGIN RAISERROR('project.id=%s scheduling_type=%s is unknown', 16, 1, @PROJECT_ID, @SCHEDULING_TYPE) RETURN @@ERROR END END
